rewards.rewardDescription: Earn 10 Reward Points for every Rs.150 spent on Dining, Movies, Groceries & Departmental Stores
Earn 1 Reward Point per Rs.150 spent on other categories

extraction_error.card_info.effective_date: Could not find the exact effective date of the terms and conditions, used the earliest mentioned date related to changes in reward points.
